definition: Schengen, village in Luxemburg, location of the 1985 signing of the agreement to create the Schengen area 申根區|申根区[Shen1 gen1 qu1]
old name for Shanghai 上海[Shang4 hai3]/surname Shen
to extend/to state/to explain/9th earthly branch: 3-5 p.m., 7th solar month (7th August-7th September), year of the Monkey/ancient Chinese compass point: 240°
root/basis/classifier for long slender objects, e.g. cigarettes, guitar strings/CL:條|条[tiao2]/radical (chemistry)
the Schengen area, a passport-free zone in Europe

sentences.english: UK visa only valid 30 days, Schengen visa for 90 days.
sentences.chinese: 英國簽證有效期僅爲30天，申根國家爲90天。

sentences.english: What are the differences between applying for a UK visa and Schengen area visa from China?
sentences.chinese: 在中國，申請英國簽證與申根區簽證有什麼不同？

sentences.english: Can I randomly access other schengen agreement kingdom?
sentences.chinese: 我可以隨意進入其他申根協議國嗎？

sentences.english: Becasue i was afraid it's too late to apply for Germany Schengen Visa.
sentences.chinese: 因爲怕德意志共合國申根簽證來不及。

sentences.english: In 2008 Switzerland joined the Schengen club and Chinese visitor numbers instantly soared.
sentences.chinese: 2008年瑞士加入申根區後中國遊客人數暴增。

sentences.english: The Schengen Accord is a separate agreement from other European Union treaties.
sentences.chinese: 申根協定是獨立於其他歐盟條約的協議。

sentences.english: I have been informed that possession of a visa is only one of the prerequisites for the entry into the European territory of the Schengen states.
sentences.chinese: 我知道擁有簽證只是入境申根國歐洲領土的條件之一。

sentences.english: I receive an NSIS ERROR when installing.
sentences.chinese: 當我接到申根安裝誤差。

sentences.english: Every country in Schengen had to bear its responsibilities, he said.
sentences.chinese: 蓋昂說，每一個申根國家必須承擔自己的職責。

sentences.english: Sweden is the "Schengen Agreement, " one of the signatories.
sentences.chinese: 瑞典是《申根協定》簽署國之一。

definition: the Schengen area, a passport-free zone in Europe
permanent residency permit (originally referred specifically to the US green card)
